text:
Let's just make a couple predictions
here

I don't think we can ever improve upon
Mother Nature, but what we can do is

hopefully take advantage of what Mother
Nature does so well.

If you're gonna build a heart you need
cells but beating cells right here in

the dish aren't enough to make a heart
you need a place to put those cells.

Printing a heart valve how does one
begin to even think about printing a heart valve?

In reality anybody who has
ever made a birthday cake can 3d print

something that is as complex as a
heart valve.

Science isn't technology we don't say
I'm gonna go in and discover that

electrical signals can trigger a
regeneration.

We're not building organs and tissues
we're building hope. Unbelievable!
